oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On design trade-offs for optimum transmitter power in indoor non-directed optical wireless channels
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PATEL, JK
GOVINDARAJAN, M
SHEVGAONKAR, RK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: indoor radio
mobile communication
optical transmitters
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Eye safety requirements in diffuse infrared (IR) indoor links impose an upper limit on average transmitter optical power. This paper discusses analytical trade-offs on the receiver time constant in order to meet the allowable exposure limit (AEL) and to ensure minimum power consumption in battery operated portables.
